data.title: Obituary Notices
data.meta_description: Thorne Times obituary notices and funeral arrangements, giving times and locations of services, burials and cremations.
data.text:
HARVEY

Christopher

Passed away suddenly on 30th July while on holiday in Spain, aged 48 years.

Beloved son, brother, uncle, cousin and friend. He will be sadly missed, but fondly remembered by all.

A memorial service will be held at the Canal Tavern in Thorne on 31st August for family and friends.

Contact Maureen for more details.

Beloved husband of Elizabeth; loving dad of Paula and the late Debbie; much loved grandad of Lisa, Zoe, Natasha, Thomas and great-grandad of Archie, Callum and TJ; dear uncle and friend of many who will be sadly missed

The funeral service and committal will take place on Thursday 22nd August 2024 at Rose Hill Crematorium, Doncaster, 10.00am.

Enquiries:

Wades Funeral Service

30 Hatfield Road,

Thorne

Doncaster

DN8 5RA

Tel: 01405 812966
